:::config { "language": "php" }
// torchlight! {"torchlightAnnotations": false}
return [
    'extensions' => [
        // Add attributes straight from markdown.
        AttributesExtension::class,

        // Add Torchlight syntax highlighting. [tl! highlight]
        TorchlightExtension::class, // [tl! highlight]
    ]
]
:::expectation
